sentence: Loved the peacefulness throughout my stay including use of the beautiful swimming pool and gym
Pool is one of my favorites in the area just enough of a party atmosphere but you can also come here to relax
We really enjoy this hotel great restaurants happy hour and nice pool as well
The rooms are spectacular resteraunt top shelf and the polside bar is right out of a movie set

The best restaurant in Miami is inside epic hotel The Lobby is nice The pool is great and the rooms have the best view everI had such a great time there celebrating my 29th birthday The only problem is that it is a bit far from south beach but I do not think it is more than 20 by cab
Sometime you can even spot big fish swimming through them
So decided to get a day pool pass 20 best move ever the hotel is amazing immaculate presented
Pool was clean and well kept
Delicious food and amazing view form the pool
POOL AREA WAS GREAT
Spent the day there walking on the beach and enjoying their pool
We went to he pool for snack
Hotel was nice but I was put in a room next to renovations and right over outside Area 31 bar that begins from 4 pm to 11 pm with loud music and lively scene outdoors as close to pool
Surfcomber pool option
Worst part is there ’s nobody at the pool pathetic
Pool closed mon to Friday for refurbishment work but we were reimbursed Uber fees to the surfcomber Miami Beach which had a nice pool in a good location
Pool looked great but was closed during our visit
the hotel and the pool are nice but I will never go back to a hotel that ask crazy prices for one drink
View was great but the pool was closed the first two days of my stay which I had no idea prior to booking
My room overlooked Biscayne Bay and I saw manatees swimming
We even got to enjoy the DJ at the pool from our balcony and he was everything
A function that has a little sign saying the pool area was being closed at half three
The Pool staff are also very attentive but be warned the drinks can be a bit pricey even when compared to London prices
The view from the pool water view rooms is impacted by 2 giant tall cranes working on construction immediately next to the hotel
The sound system around the pool is similar to that of a festival no wonder multiple parties are hosted polside for the Miami Dance Music festival
There are several bars restaurants and pool areas within the hotel

What a nightmare hotel sloppy service noisie noise noise everywhere pool is like a nightclub and hotel guests were booted out at 3 pm to make way for corporate events overall a disappointing and utterly lacklustre experience indifferent on so many levels and incompetent on multiple levels this hotel is guaranteed to disappoint with its disregard for anyone under 20 who does n’t want to be in nightclub environment at 1 pm on a Saturday afternoon try your luck elsewhere no wonder they have such a poor customer return rate none of our party will ever be back
Forget about getting a beverage at the pool
The pool was closing at 7 pm and they did n’t provide any towels from 545 pm
Unfortunately my stay was short and I did not get to check out the pool or any other amenities
